meanings.definition: A type of lizard found in North America.
meanings.sent1: The galliwasps basked in the sun on the rocks.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of galliwasps scurrying across the forest floor.
meanings.sent3: The galliwasps decided to have a race to see who was the fastest lizard.
meanings.sent4: Her agility on the soccer field was compared to the swift movements of galliwasps.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the colorful patterns on the galliwasps' scales.

meanings.sent1: The galliwasps were hiding under the fallen leaves.
meanings.sent2: We found a jar full of galliwasps in the old shed.
meanings.sent3: The galliwasps in the jar seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The room was buzzing with excitement, like a jar full of galliwasps.
meanings.sent5: The galliwasps crawled slowly along the branches, their tiny feet leaving marks.
